courses.title: TypeScript Fundamentals v3
courses.summary: Learn everything you need to know in order to confidently and successfully use TypeScript to build a modern JavaScript app.

courses.title: Intermediate TypeScript
courses.summary:
Leverage TypeScript's strengths to provide clarity in the face of
complexity, while protecting your codebase and team from it's weaknesses.

courses.title: Making TypeScript Stick
courses.summary:
Tackle a series of challenges designed to reinforce your knowledge and make
the important concepts truly "stick" in your mind.

courses.title: Full Stack TypeScript
courses.summary:
Combine TypeScript and GraphQL's type systems to create full-stack, fully
type-checked code bases that are shockingly easy to refactor and maintain.

frontmatter.title: Modules & CJS interop
frontmatter.description:
Although most of the code we write today is in the form of
ES modules, plenty of dependencies are packaged in the
CommonJS module format. In this chapter, we'll look at modules in depth
so that you have all the tools you need in order to consume all
the dependencies you care about, while keeping the TS compiler happy

frontmatter.title: Conditional Types
frontmatter.description:
Conditional types can be thought of as "a ternary operator, for types".
While there is no "control flow" in a world where we're describing constraints with types
(instead of procedural steps to execute "in a flow"), this tool does provide
an important foundation for switching logic based on type information

much more flexible version of an index signature. We'll

language features like indexed access types and conditional
types even more powerful!
